client

Class ServerPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ServerPoller

  • public class ServerPoller
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerPoller(IProxy proxy)
      Takes in a proxy in order to call the methods to check the ServerModel's version and to retrieve it if needed in order to update.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean needUpdate() 
      void update()
      The update method will use the proxy to get the latest ServerModel and loads it into the ClientModel locally

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerPoller

        public ServerPoller(IProxy proxy)
        Takes in a proxy in order to call the methods to check the ServerModel's version and to retrieve it if needed in order to update.
        Parameters:
        proxy, - An IProxy to be used to query the server for needed updates
        Precondition
        proxy is not null
        Postcondition
        The proxy will be loaded and the other methods in ServerPoller will be callable after creation of a ServerPoller instance.

    • Method Detail

      • needUpdate

        public boolean needUpdate()
                   throws ServerException
        Returns:
        Whether the local ClientModel needs an update
        Throws:
        ServerException - when this function fails when it shouldn't
        Precondition
        None
        Postcondition
        The server's model number is different if true, false otherwise

      • update

        public void update()
            throws ServerException
        The update method will use the proxy to get the latest ServerModel and loads it into the ClientModel locally
        Throws:
        ServerException - when this function fails when it shouldn't
        Precondition
        needUdate() returns true
        Postcondition
        The local model class is replaced with a clone of the model class on the server
